mapper.insert: insert into ask_question (login_name, question, addition, tags, answers, last_answered_time, approved, approved_by, approved_time, created_time) value(#{loginName}, #{question}, #{addition}, #{tags, typeHandler=com.tuotiansudai.ask.repository.mybatis.TagListTypeHandler}, #{answers}, #{lastAnsweredTime}, #{approved}, #{approvedBy}, #{approvedTime}, now())
mapper.update: update ask_question set login_name = #{loginName}, question = #{question}, addition = #{addition}, tags = #{tags, typeHandler=com.tuotiansudai.ask.repository.mybatis.TagListTypeHandler}, answers = #{answers}, last_answered_time = #{lastAnsweredTime}, approved = #{approved}, approved_by = #{approvedBy}, approved_time = #{approvedTime} where id = #{id}
mapper.select: select *, (select mobile from user where user.login_name = #{loginName}) as mobile from ask_question where login_name = #{loginName}
select ifnull(count(1), 0) from ask_question where approved is TRUE or login_name = #{loginName}

select *, (select mobile from user where user.login_name = ask_question.login_name) as mobile from ask_question where (approved is TRUE or login_name = #{loginName}) and not exists (select 1 from ask_answer where ask_question.id = ask_answer.question_id and best_answer is TRUE) order by created_time desc limit #{index}, #{pageSize}
